description=M5Stack-Core-ESP32
upload.tool=esptool
upload.maximum_size=1310720
upload.maximum_data_size=327680
upload.wait_for_upload_port=true
serial.disableDTR=true
serial.disableRTS=true
build.mcu=esp32
build.core=esp32
build.variant=m5stack_core_esp32
build.board=M5Stack_Core_ESP32
build.f_cpu=240000000L
build.flash_size=4MB
build.flash_mode=dio
build.boot=dio
build.partitions=default
build.defines=

options.FlashMode.name=Flash Mode
options.FlashMode.default=qio
options.FlashMode.qio.name=QIO
options.FlashMode.qio.build.flash_mode=dio
options.FlashMode.qio.build.boot=qio
options.FlashMode.dio.name=DIO
options.FlashMode.dio.build.flash_mode=dio
options.FlashMode.dio.build.boot=dio
options.FlashMode.qout.name=QOUT
options.FlashMode.qout.build.flash_mode=dout
options.FlashMode.qout.build.boot=qout
options.FlashMode.dout.name=DOUT
options.FlashMode.dout.build.flash_mode=dout
options.FlashMode.dout.build.boot=dout
build.flash_mode=${option:FlashMode.build.flash_mode}

options.FlashFreq.name=Flash Frequency
options.FlashFreq.default=80
options.FlashFreq.80.name=80MHz
options.FlashFreq.80.build.flash_freq=80m
options.FlashFreq.40.name=40MHz
options.FlashFreq.40.build.flash_freq=40m
build.flash_freq=${option:FlashFreq.build.flash_freq}

options.PartitionScheme.name=Partition Scheme
options.PartitionScheme.default=defaultschem
options.PartitionScheme.defaultschem.name=Default
options.PartitionScheme.defaultschem.build.partitions=default
options.PartitionScheme.minimal.name=Minimal (2MB FLASH)
options.PartitionScheme.minimal.build.partitions=minimal
options.PartitionScheme.no_ota.name=No OTA (Large APP)
options.PartitionScheme.no_ota.build.partitions=no_ota
options.PartitionScheme.no_ota.upload.maximum_size=2097152
options.PartitionScheme.min_spiffs.name=Minimal SPIFFS (Large APPS with OTA)
options.PartitionScheme.min_spiffs.build.partitions=min_spiffs
options.PartitionScheme.min_spiffs.upload.maximum_size=1966080
build.partitions=${option:PartitionScheme.build.partitions}

name=m5stack-core-esp32
family=esp32
group=ESP32
core=esp32
